Lack enough support: The claim lacks evidence or support as there is no record or evidence of Donald Trump appearing on The Phil Donahue Show in 1989 or discussing his religious views during any appearance on the show.
Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that there is no evidence of Donald Trump making the statement about being an atheist on The Phil Donahue Show.
Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates by attributing a quote to Donald Trump that has no basis in reality.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that Donald Trump made a statement about being an atheist on The Phil Donahue Show in 1989 without any evidence to support this assumption.
Exist alternative explanation: The alternative explanation is that the claim is false and the quote attributed to Donald Trump is fake.
